results.content: Good stuff. i was actually looking for a course that taught the project built in the course, i looked everywhere online, but couldnt find any until a friend told me about udemy. i came over to udemy, luckily for me i saw this, though some functionalities of the project differs from what i was actually looking for in P2P donation platform, i think i got a good foundation from the course to build upon. more specifically i like that the merging functionality is flexible enough to be altered to accomodate a 3:1, 4:1 etc merging of users.

results.content:
This course is great! If you are looking for a practical real-world application project for PHP, Macjoe is a great instructor. He explained the lessons step-by-step and his teaching method is the best when it comes in learning real-world projects. I look forward to another real-world php project courses with Macjoe.

Keep up the great work Macjoe.

results.content:
The instructor provides great detail on 'Object Oriented Programming' with PHP and explains how it relates to the course project. The project encompasses several PHP libraries along with jQuery, HTML and CSS.

It is a good introduction into building a P2P website. I will definitely use the knowledge gained from the course to create a P2P website with a different focus, though.

response.content: Thank you!!. Good to know that the course is useful to you
response.content_html: Thank you!!. Good to know that the course is useful to you

results.content: I like the strong focus on separation of concerns that the instructor uses for the project. Unlike some codebases i have studied in time past  that mixes up lots of html code with php logic, the instructor ensures that the logic(php code) is separated from the  physical representation(html ). Something similar to the mvc architecture. Good job. Highly recommended.

response.content: Thank you sammie for the detailed review
response.content_html: Thank you sammie for the detailed review

results.content: The course is one of the kind integrating P2P applications with PHP. Exciting use case for the growing P2P market and e-commerce. The instructor has got a good topic that most of the developers could grab  for more secured and user friendly and trustworty applications. The instructor has good grasp of what he is teaching.
